pullRequest.title: CDAP-16709 implement auto join for mapreduce
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implemented AutoJoiner for mapreduce by creating a bridge that
implements the old Joiner API using the JoinDefinition from the
new AutoJoiner API.

commit.message:
CDAP-16709 implement auto join for mapreduce

Implemented AutoJoiner for mapreduce by creating a bridge that
implements the old Joiner API using the JoinDefinition from the
new AutoJoiner API.

nodes.bodyText: This might be a design question. Since in the old joiner, the join key and join type are generic. Are we removing that functionality for the new joiner?
